casebody.data:
STATE FARM FIRE AND CASUALTY COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES, ex rel. Cori RIGSBY, et al. No. 15-513. Supreme Court of the United States May 31, 2016.

Petition for a writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.
